title: What are some theories about why the Native American city of Cahokia vanished? - Quora

response.answer_text: I have one. It's not shared by any scholars or archaeologists that I know of. So take it as such but I will make my case. Actually most of my answers deal with it on a broad level. Hernando de Soto’s expedition in 1539 to 44. The experts claim the Mississippian culture declined before Spaniards came but in his chronicles they were alive and well. After wards they disappeared. Diseases are the likely culprit. Here is a map. I've included it in many previous answers hoping to spur some interest. Most of the cities, Chiefdoms went extinct.
